segments.text: What did you do last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just stayed at home and watched TV .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you watch the Barcelona versus Madrid game ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it was a very evenly matched game .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What were the results of the game ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ended in a tie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What was the actual score ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was three all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I thought Barcelona was going to win . They are a much better team than Madrid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If Barcelona had played as they normally do , they should have won .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Their goalkeepers got injured after the first goal , but he kept on playing anyway .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That explains it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many more games are left this season ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was the last game before the playoffs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When do the playoffs start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In a few weeks . Are you planning on watching them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course ! I really love watching football games on TV .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me , too ! Do you want to come over and watch the next game at my place ? I'm planning on having a few people over to watch it together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , that would be great .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , it's a date then !
segments.speaker: S1
